div.div: Survival population (log CFU/ mL) of Staph. aureus and Salm. Typhimurium treated with ZEO and SNP alone and in combination during 15 min contact time at room temperature.

td.style: border-width: 2px 1px 2px 0px; border-style: solid solid solid none; background-color:#DEE9C8
border-width: 2px 1px 1px 0px; border-style: solid solid solid none; background-color:#DEE9C8
border-width: 2px 0px 1px 0px; border-style: solid none solid none; background-color:#DEE9C8

tr.style: border-width: 0px 0px 2px 0px; border-style: none none solid none; background-color:#DEE9C8;

td.style: border-width: 0px 1px 0px 0px; border-style: none solid none none;
border-width: 0px 1px 0px 0px; border-style: none solid none none;
border-width: 0px 1px 0px 0px; border-style: none solid none none;

tr.style: border-width: 0px 0px 2px 0px; border-style: none none solid none;

td.style: border-width: 0px 1px 0px 0px; border-style: none solid none none;
border-width: 0px 1px 0px 0px; border-style: none solid none none;

fn.p: *Initial bacterial counts: 10 6 CFU mL -1. Different letters for each column of indicate a statistically significant difference ( P < 0.05).
